New Records: Bradley Barcola scored France's fastest goal in history, taking just 12 seconds against Italy
Key Match Events: France took an early lead but lost 3-1 to Italy
Post-Match Reflections: France's loss was a setback in their Nations League campaign
Miscellaneous Highlights: Barcola's first goal for France and his impressive season with Paris Saint-Germain
